Pre-Game Insights: Argentina is the heavy favorite to win, with Lionel Messi leading the team.
Canada's Alphonso Davies has won all three matches he has played against Lionel Messi.
Canada's growth in recent years gives their fans a great deal of optimism.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The tournament will be held in the USA, with the first match between Argentina and Canada on June 20 at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta.
Others: The match between Argentina and Canada will be the opening match of the tournament.
Canada announced its new head coach, Jesse Marsch, just five weeks before the start of the tournament.
